ARE_YOU_SURE_RESTART: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO RESTART?
TUTORIAL_PAGE_1_TEXT_1: Drag and drop the pieces into the board. Complete a row or column to clear it and gain points.
TUTORIAL_PAGE_1_TEXT_2: Pieces must be placed before the timer runs out.
TUTORIAL_PAGE_2_TEXT_1: BOMBS: Destroy a 3x3 area around them when placed.
TUTORIAL_PAGE_2_TEXT_2: They appear randomly to help you clear the board.
TUTORIAL_PAGE_3_TEXT_1: REDUCERS: Convert all remaining pieces into 1x1 squares for a turn.
